price: Tàbí A dá àwọn mọlāika ní obìnrin, tí àwọn sì jẹ́ ẹlẹ́rìí?”
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثٗا وَهُمۡ شَٰهِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqnā al-malāikata ināthan wahum shāhidūna
